claim: SR 78 from I-5 to I-15, and from the eastern junction with SR 86 to the eastern junction with SR 111 is part of the National Highway System (NHS), a network of highways that are considered essential to the country's economy, defense, and mobility by the Federal Highway Administration.

previous_sentence: The section of SR 78 from the western junction of SR 79 to the western junction with SR 86 is designated by the California State Legislature as eligible by law for the State Scenic Highway System; however, only the section in Anza-Borrego Desert State Park has officially been designated by Caltrans as being part of the system, meaning that it is a substantial section of highway passing through a "memorable landscape" with no "visual intrusions", where the potential designation has gained popular favor with the community; it gained this status in 1971.
subsequent_sentence: In 2013, SR 78 had an annual average daily traffic (AADT) of 670 between the San Diego–Imperial county line and the western SR 86 junction, and 163,000 between Twin Oaks Valley Road and Nordahl Road, the latter of which was the highest AADT for the highway.

claim: Jeremy Signor of USgamer agreed that Knight Lore felt more like a world than a painting and added that the game's innovative use of successive, single-screen rooms pre-dated The Legend of Zelda by years.
title: Knight Lore
previous_sentence: Though isometric games had existed previously, in a retrospective review, Gillen (Rock, Paper, Shotgun) recalled that Knight Lore was the first game to offer a "world" with physical depth for exploration as opposed to the simple mechanics of arcade games.
subsequent_sentence: Gillen said the game's punishing style (unforgiving gameplay, high difficulty, awkward controls) had become obsolete in the 30 years since its release and criticised Knight Lore as "enormously innovative, incredibly atmospheric, and totally unplayable", suggesting that the similar Head over Heels (1987) had aged much better.
previous_sentence_translated: Meskipun game isometrik sudah ada sebelumnya, dalam ulasan retrospektif, Gillen (Rock, Paper, Shotgun) mengenang bahwa Knight Lore adalah game pertama yang menawarkan "dunia" dengan kedalaman fisik untuk dijelajahi, berbeda dengan mekanisme sederhana game arkade.
claim_translated: Jeremy Signor dari USgamer setuju bahwa Knight Lore terasa lebih seperti sebuah dunia daripada sebuah lukisan dan menambahkan bahwa penggunaan inovatif game ini berupa ruangan-ruangan layar tunggal yang berurutan mendahului The Legend of Zelda selama bertahun-tahun.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Gillen mengatakan gaya permainan yang menghukum (gameplay yang tidak kenal ampun, tingkat kesulitan tinggi, kontrol yang canggung) telah menjadi usang dalam 30 tahun sejak dirilis dan mengkritik Knight Lore sebagai "sangat inovatif, sangat atmosferik, dan sama sekali tidak dapat dimainkan", menunjukkan bahwa Head over Heels (1987) yang serupa telah menua jauh lebih baik.

claim: Specifically, they noted that Fagan had largely and inaccurately plagiarised his article from an earlier account of Anning's life and work by Dorset native Henry Rowland Brown, from the second edition of Brown's 1859 guidebook, The Beauties of Lyme Regis.

previous_sentence: The profile, "Mary Anning, The Fossil Finder," was long attributed to Dickens himself but, in 2014, historians of palaeontology Michael A. Taylor and Hugh Torrens identified Henry Stuart Fagan as the author, noting that Fagan's work was "neither original nor reliable" and "introduced errors into the Anning literature which are still problematic."

claim_translated: Secara khusus, mereka mencatat bahwa Fagan sebagian besar dan secara tidak akurat menjiplak artikelnya dari catatan sebelumnya tentang kehidupan dan karya Anning oleh penduduk asli Dorset, Henry Rowland Brown, dari edisi kedua buku panduan Brown tahun 1859, The Beauties of Lyme Regis.

claim: The historian Mark A. Lause rejects the numbers reported by the Confederates and suggests the Union figure is too low due to not accurately counting militia strength, suggesting a more accurate figure would be about 650.

claim: Swift wrote "Tied Together with a Smile" the day she learned one of her best friends had an eating disorder.

subsequent_sentence: The song describes a young girl who lacks self-esteem and disguises her inner turbulence with a smile, but Swift's character tells her that she will never overcome her struggles until she learns to love herself.
previous_sentence_translated: "A Place in This World", yang ditulis oleh Swift pada usia tiga belas tahun ketika ia pertama kali pindah ke Nashville, mengungkapkan ketidakpastiannya tentang di mana ia benar-benar berada.
claim_translated: Swift menulis "Tied Together with a Smile" pada hari ia mengetahui salah satu sahabatnya menderita gangguan makan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Lagu ini menceritakan seorang gadis muda yang kurang percaya diri dan menyembunyikan gejolak batinnya dengan senyuman, tetapi karakter Swift memberitahunya bahwa ia tidak akan pernah mengatasi perjuangannya sampai ia belajar mencintai dirinya sendiri.

claim: Slough may mean a place of deep mud or mire, a swamp, a river inlet or backwater, or a creek in a marsh or tide flat.

previous_sentence: Slough usually rhymes with shoe in the U. S. except in New England, where it usually rhymes with now, the preferred British pronunciation.

previous_sentence_translated: Di AS, kata "slough" biasanya berima dengan "shoe", kecuali di New England, di mana kata tersebut biasanya berima dengan "now", yang merupakan pengucapan pilihan di Inggris.
claim_translated: Slough dapat berarti tempat lumpur atau rawa yang dalam, rawa, muara sungai atau anak sungai, atau anak sungai di rawa atau dataran pasang surut.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Columbia Slough diklasifikasikan sebagai "sungai" dalam Sistem Informasi Nama Geografis (GNIS) dari Survei Geologi Amerika Serikat (USGS).

claim: McQueen's work was highly autobiographical: he incorporated elements of his memories, feelings, and family history into his designs and runway shows.

previous_sentence: McQueen had a lifelong fascination with history, sexuality, violence, and death, which he translated into his designs from the beginning of his nearly twenty-year career to the very end.

claim: The Assembly passed a resolution that "With effect from the day following the close of the present session of the Assembly, the League of Nations shall cease to exist except for the sole purpose of the liquidation of its affairs as provided in the present resolution."

claim_translated: Majelis mengesahkan resolusi yang menyatakan bahwa "Berlaku mulai hari setelah penutupan sesi Majelis saat ini, Liga Bangsa-Bangsa akan berhenti ada kecuali untuk satu-satunya tujuan likuidasi urusannya sebagaimana diatur dalam resolusi ini."
subsequent_sentence_translated: Dewan Likuidasi yang terdiri dari sembilan orang dari berbagai negara menghabiskan 15 bulan berikutnya mengawasi pengalihan aset dan fungsi Liga ke Perserikatan Bangsa-Bangsa atau badan-badan khusus, dan akhirnya membubarkan diri pada 31 Juli 1947.

claim: Leaving aside formation from the accretion disk surrounding the white dwarf, there are two ways a planet could end in a close orbit around stars of this kind: by surviving being engulfed by the star during its red giant phase, and then spiralling inward, or inward migration after the white dwarf has formed.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Kasus pertama tidak masuk akal untuk benda-benda bermassa rendah, karena kecil kemungkinannya benda-benda tersebut dapat bertahan setelah terserap oleh bintangnya.

'beat to the wide' adalah bentuk kelelahan yang lebih awal dan mungkin lebih parah, karena mereka yang mengalaminya tidak dapat mengomentari kondisi ini dan tidak tahan jika hal itu disebutkan di hadapan mereka."

claim: It is possible that while Luther later saw the 31 October letter to Albert as the beginning of the Reformation, he did not post the Theses to the church door until mid-November, but he may not have posted them on the door at all.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Bagaimanapun, Tesis-tesis tersebut sudah dikenal luas di kalangan elit intelektual Wittenberg tak lama setelah Luther mengirimkannya kepada Albert.

claim: Accolade's case was further hurt by a presentation by a Sega engineer named Takeshi Nagashima, who showed two Sega game cartridges that were able to run on the Genesis III without the trademark-displaying TMSS, and offered them to Accolade's defense team but would not reveal how that was possible.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Pada akhirnya, hal ini akan mengakibatkan kekalahan Accolade pada tanggal 3 April 1992, ketika Hakim Caulfield memutuskan untuk mendukung Sega dan mengeluarkan perintah yang melarang penjualan di masa mendatang oleh Accolade atas game yang kompatibel dengan Genesis yang menggabungkan pesan Sega atau menggunakan hasil rekayasa balik.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Ketiga anggota Fenian itu dinyatakan bersalah atas pembunuhan seorang petugas polisi, dan digantung bersama.

claim: Her screenplay, Georgia, Georgia (1972), was the first original script by a Black woman to be produced, and she was the first African American woman to direct a major motion picture, Down in the Delta, in 1998.
title: Maya Angelou

previous_sentence_translated: Karier akting Angelou yang sukses mencakup peran dalam berbagai drama, film, dan program televisi, di antaranya penampilannya dalam miniseri televisi Roots pada tahun 1977.
claim_translated: Skenarionya, Georgia, Georgia (1972), adalah naskah orisinal pertama karya seorang wanita kulit hitam yang diproduksi, dan dia adalah wanita Afrika-Amerika pertama yang menyutradarai film layar lebar, Down in the Delta, pada tahun 1998.

claim: She also displays psionic abilities after telekinetically killing a security guard.

previous_sentence: Alice wakes up in an Umbrella research facility and escapes with help from Carlos, Jill, L. J., and Angela.

claim: The pair may undertake a number of different behaviors, including bumping, chasing, and ambushing.

claim: The women arrive and disguise Fenton as a monk, telling him that they have arranged to spoil Ford's and Caius's plans.

claim: Army organization was improved and British consultants were employed to train and professionalize soldiers.
title: Madagascar
section: 19th century and the Kingdom of Madagascar

subsequent_sentence: Polygamy was outlawed and Christianity declared the official religion of the court in 1869, was adopted alongside traditional beliefs among a growing portion of the populace.

claim: The arachnoid mater (so named because of its spider-web-like appearance) is a loosely fitting sac on top of the pia mater.
title: Meningitis
previous_sentence: The pia mater is a delicate impermeable membrane that firmly adheres to the surface of the brain, following all the minor contours.
subsequent_sentence: The subarachnoid space separates the arachnoid and pia mater membranes and is filled with cerebrospinal fluid.
previous_sentence_translated: Pia mater adalah selaput halus yang tidak tembus air dan melekat erat pada permukaan otak, mengikuti semua kontur kecil.
claim_translated: Arachnoid mater (dinamakan demikian karena penampilannya yang menyerupai jaring laba-laba) adalah kantung yang longgar di atas pia mater.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ruang subaraknoid memisahkan membran araknoid dan pia mater dan terisi dengan cairan serebrospinal.

claim: Lüdecke sent the signal "Am sending negotiator" to the British warships, and dispatched Canaris in a pinnace; Glasgow continued to bombard the defenseless cruiser.
title: SMS Dresden (1907)

claim_translated: Lüdecke mengirimkan sinyal "Mengirim negosiator" ke kapal perang Inggris, dan mengirim Canaris dengan perahu kecil; Glasgow terus mengebom kapal penjelajah tak berdaya itu.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Dalam upaya lain untuk menghentikan serangan itu, Lüdecke mengibarkan bendera putih, yang membuat Glasgow menghentikan tembakan.

claim: At dinner, Bashir is effectively ignored by the two Trills as they reminisce about their past hosts.

claim: Subaerial alkali basalt flows are large in areal extent and have thicknesses of 2 to 3 m (6.6 to 9.8 ft).

subsequent_sentence_translated: Basalt alkali Formasi Danau Arktik telah menghasilkan penanggalan kalium-argon sebesar 0,71 ± 0,05 juta tahun dan 0,45 ± 0,07 juta tahun.

claim: Her writings received critical attention from mainstream critics, critics of children's literature, and critics of speculative fiction.
title: Ursula K. Le Guin

previous_sentence_translated: Meskipun Le Guin terutama dikenal karena karya-karya fiksi spekulatifnya, ia juga menulis fiksi realistis, nonfiksi, puisi, dan beberapa bentuk sastra lainnya, dan sebagai hasilnya karyanya sulit untuk diklasifikasikan.

claim: Placing two electrodes with a high voltage between them on the surface of the ice core gives a measurement of the conductivity at that point.
title: Ice core
previous_sentence: These seasonal changes can be detected because they lead to changes in the electrical conductivity of the ice.
subsequent_sentence: Dragging them down the length of the core, and recording the conductivity at each point, gives a graph that shows an annual periodicity.
previous_sentence_translated: Perubahan musiman ini dapat dideteksi karena menyebabkan perubahan pada konduktivitas listrik es.
claim_translated: Penempatan dua elektroda dengan tegangan tinggi di antara keduanya pada permukaan inti es memberikan pengukuran konduktivitas pada titik tersebut.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Dengan menyeretnya di sepanjang inti dan merekam konduktivitas di setiap titik, akan dihasilkan grafik yang menunjukkan periodisitas tahunan.

claim: In general, the Antainambalana River appears to isolate the red ruffed lemurs from the neighboring subspecies of black-and-white ruffed lemur, V. v. subcincta.
title: Ruffed lemur
previous_sentence: Historically, the confluence of the Vohimara and Antainambalana Rivers may have been a zone of hybridization between these two species, although no conclusive results have indicated current interbreeding.
subsequent_sentence: The subspecies V. v. variegata can be found further south, and V. v. editorum is the southernmost subspecies.
previous_sentence_translated: Secara historis, pertemuan Sungai Vohimara dan Antainambalana mungkin merupakan zona hibridisasi antara kedua spesies ini, meskipun belum ada hasil konklusif yang menunjukkan adanya perkawinan silang saat ini.
claim_translated: Secara umum, Sungai Antainambalana tampaknya mengisolasi lemur berkerah merah dari subspesies lemur berkerah hitam-putih di sekitarnya, V. v. subcincta.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Subspesies V. v. variegata dapat ditemukan lebih jauh ke selatan, dan V. v. editorum adalah subspesies yang paling selatan.

claim: King wrote that while depictions such as Charlotte's alienation from experiences like ikebana are evidence that the film abstains from the Orientalist "mythology of Japanese tradition as source of solace", the film often situates Japan as a source of "difference" for the characters by relying on crude jokes and stereotypes of Japanese people as "crazy" or "extreme".
title: Lost in Translation (film)
previous_sentence: When Japan appears superficial, inappropriately erotic, or unintelligible, we are never completely sure whether this vision belongs to Coppola, to her characters, or simply to a Hollywood cinematic imaginary."

claim_translated: King menulis bahwa meskipun penggambaran seperti keterasingan Charlotte dari pengalaman seperti ikebana adalah bukti bahwa film tersebut menjauh dari "mitologi tradisi Jepang sebagai sumber penghiburan" ala Orientalis, film tersebut sering kali menempatkan Jepang sebagai sumber "perbedaan" bagi para karakter dengan mengandalkan lelucon kasar dan stereotip orang Jepang sebagai "gila" atau "ekstrem".

claim_translated: Permusuhan antara Roma dan Parthia kembali terjadi ketika Osroes I dari Parthia (memerintah sekitar 109–128 M) menggulingkan raja Armenia Sanatruk dan menggantikannya dengan Axidares, putra Pacorus II, tanpa berkonsultasi dengan Roma.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Kaisar Romawi Trajan (memerintah 98–117 M) membunuh calon takhta Parthia berikutnya, Parthamasiris, pada tahun 114 M, dan menjadikan Armenia sebagai provinsi Romawi.

previous_sentence_translated: Terkejut melihat bahwa itu tidak berpengaruh, dia melarikan diri dari inangnya sebelum Sam bisa membalas.
claim_translated: Sam yang hancur memeluk Dean, yang jiwanya kemudian diperlihatkan di Neraka tergantung pada bentangan rantai dan pengait daging sambil berteriak sia-sia meminta Sam untuk menolong.

claim: In teenagers and adults with an abrupt onset of tics and other behavioral symptoms, a urine drug screen for stimulants might be requested.
title: Tourette syndrome
previous_sentence: The typical age of onset of TS is before adolescence.
previous_sentence_translated: Usia tipikal munculnya TS adalah sebelum masa remaja.
claim_translated: Pada remaja dan orang dewasa dengan kemunculan tics dan gejala perilaku lainnya secara tiba-tiba, mungkin akan diminta pemeriksaan urine untuk mendeteksi stimulan.

claim: The Stranges become a popular couple in London.
title: Jonathan Strange & Mr Norrell
subsequent_sentence: Lady Pole and Strange's wife, Arabella, become friends; during a visit, Arabella meets the Gentleman with the Thistledown Hair, whom she assumes is a relative of the Poles.
claim_translated: Keluarga Strange menjadi pasangan populer di London.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Lady Pole dan istri Strange, Arabella, menjadi teman; saat berkunjung, Arabella bertemu dengan Pria Berambut Benang Sutra, yang ia kira adalah kerabat keluarga Pole.

claim: Trailing 3–0 at half-time, they scored three goals in a six-minute spell in the second half to level the score at 3–3.
title: Liverpool F.C. in international football
section: Renewed European success – the Benítez years (2004–10)
previous_sentence: Liverpool faced six-time European champions AC Milan in the final at the Atatürk Stadium in Istanbul on 25 May 2005.
subsequent_sentence: There were no goals during extra time, so the match was decided by a penalty shoot-out.
section_translated: Kesuksesan Eropa yang diperbarui – tahun-tahun Benítez (2004–10)
previous_sentence_translated: Liverpool menghadapi juara Eropa enam kali, AC Milan, di final di Stadion Atatürk di Istanbul pada 25 Mei 2005.
claim_translated: Tertinggal 3-0 pada babak pertama, mereka mencetak tiga gol dalam rentang waktu enam menit di babak kedua untuk menyamakan kedudukan menjadi 3-3.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Tidak ada gol yang tercipta selama perpanjangan waktu, sehingga pertandingan ditentukan melalui adu penalti.
